Had a great meeting with Tameron Kugler, Director of the Currituck County Department of Travel and Tourism to discuss the impact of the tourism industry on the local economy. Did you know that the Currituck Outer Banks generated over $375,400,000 from tourism in 2020? https://t.co/5gbGme7Ac9
